thread.title: Marijuana Helps Heal Broken Bones: Study
thread.title_full: Marijuana Helps Heal Broken Bones: Study

author: David Moye
title: Marijuana Helps Heal Broken Bones: Study
text:
Marijuana Helps Heal Broken Bones: Study Newser.com 
There's a new and very promising use for marijuana, or at least a compound found in it. 
Researchers discovered that cannabidiol (CBD) worked wonders for rats with broken limbs.
